ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Obeyed and worthy there of trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: there he is obeyed and held trustworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: obeyed by (all creatures) and faithful to His trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The one who is obeyed, and trustworthy. (Other angels obey angel Jibreel).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: One (to be) obeyed, and faithful in trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who is obeyed there and is worthy of trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: one who is obeyed and is trustworthy as well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: With authority there, (and) faithful to his trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Obeyed (by the angels), trustworthy there (in the heavens).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:21] obeyed there, the angels obey him in the heavens, trustworthy, with the Revelation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((One) to be obeyed) i.e. Gabriel is obeyed in Heaven: the angels obey him, (and trustworthy) in conveying 735 the message to the prophets;
